code: @Override public ConditionOutcome getMatchOutcome(ConditionContext context, AnnotatedTypeMetadata metadata) {     ConditionMessage.Builder message = ConditionMessage.forCondition("OpenID Connect Issuer URI Condition").     Environment environment = context.getEnvironment().     String issuerUri = environment.getProperty("spring.security.oauth2.resourceserver.jwt.issuer-uri").     String jwkSetUri = environment.getProperty("spring.security.oauth2.resourceserver.jwt.jwk-set-uri").     if (!StringUtils.hasText(issuerUri)) {         return ConditionOutcome.noMatch(message.didNotFind("issuer-uri property").atAll()).     }     if (StringUtils.hasText(jwkSetUri)) {         return ConditionOutcome.noMatch(message.found("jwk-set-uri property").items(jwkSetUri)).     }     return ConditionOutcome.match(message.foundExactly("issuer-uri property")). }
